summary: Project for “Track Your Fitness Journey”: update the initial signup page’s existing 4-image gallery by replacing only the 2nd image with the provided uploaded image (no cropping/resizing/styling changes).

existing_features.title: Update the initial signup page image gallery on `frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx` by replacing only the 2nd image in the `PREVIEW_IMAGES` array (currently `'/assets/main2a.png'`) to use the uploaded image at `'/assets/cal.png'`, keeping the gallery at 4 images and leaving the other 3 entries unchanged.

new_feature_requests.summary: Replace the 2nd image in the initial signup page’s existing 4-image gallery with the uploaded image (display as-is).
Add the uploaded image file `cal.png` as a static frontend asset under `frontend/public/assets/` so it can be referenced at runtime without any resizing/cropping/styling changes.
